name: unassignAllMembers
description:
Use this API to remove all members from a Call Queue who were previously assigned to that Call Queue. The members could be phone users or [common area phones](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/360028516231-Managing-Common-Area-Phones). **Prerequisites:**
* Pro or higher account plan. * Zoom Phone license
**Scopes:** `phone:write:admin`
**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Light`
